de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities.colliosiondetection

Class CollisionMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities.colliosiondetection.CollisionMap

  • public class CollisionMap
extends java.lang.Object
    A CollisionMap holds all CollisionGeometries and orders them in a grid structure

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int expTileScale
      the scaling mapTiles -> collisionTiles.
      int height
      the grid height
      CollisionMapTile[][] map
      the grid where the geometries are stored
      CollisionMapTile[][] outerBorder
      if an geometry doesn't fit in the grid it is stored here
      CollisionBox[][] tileCollisionBoxes
      A storage for CollisionGeometries of the mapTiles
      int width
      the grid width

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CollisionMap(TileMap map)
      Creates a new CollisionMap with an scale of 1 (expScale = 0)
      CollisionMap(TileMap map, int expScale)
      Creates a new CollisionMap The expScale is exponential.

    • Field Detail

      • width

        public final int width
        the grid width

      • height

        public final int height
        the grid height

      • expTileScale

        public final int expTileScale
        the scaling mapTiles -> collisionTiles. This value is exponential (2^n)

      • map

        public final CollisionMapTile[][] map
        the grid where the geometries are stored

      • outerBorder

        public final CollisionMapTile[][] outerBorder
        if an geometry doesn't fit in the grid it is stored here

      • tileCollisionBoxes

        public final CollisionBox[][] tileCollisionBoxes
        A storage for CollisionGeometries of the mapTiles

    • Constructor Detail

      • CollisionMap

        public CollisionMap(TileMap map)
        Creates a new CollisionMap with an scale of 1 (expScale = 0)
        Parameters:
        map - the tile map

      • CollisionMap

        public CollisionMap(TileMap map,
            int expScale)
        Creates a new CollisionMap The expScale is exponential. This means: 0 : MapTiles == CollisionTiles 1 : CollisionTiles are 2 times bigger 2 : CollisionTiles are 4 times bigger -1: CollisionTiles are 2 times smaller etc
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        expScale - the ratio collisionMapTileSize / mapTileSize in the form [2^n]
